creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Stone relief in two parts depicting scenes from the life of St. John the Baptist. Inscription: Disse Stein seynd gestufft / zu ainer Er und Anrueff von sandt Johannes. Got / seynens genadig. Anno Domini 1519. (These stones have been donated to the honor and invocation of St. John. God have mercy upon us. Anno Dimini 1519.) Reliefs are framed; frames are nailed together; cat. card dims H 42 x W 60\'.
title: Reliefs of Scenes of the Life of St. John the Baptist
